line_1: Then drew his pointed Weapon from the Sheath,
line_2: Confus'dly wild, and all his Thoughts on Death;

line_1: In whom no Bones their branching Prickles sheath;
line_2: Soft Fishes, who their plyant Bodies wreath,

line_1: He took the Gift: Nor ever will I sheath
line_2: The General said, unless by Glorious Death

line_1: And in the fire throws the sheath;
line_2: When Vengeance draws the sword in wrath,
